mobs.LongDesc: The Amazing Spider-Man is here clinging on his apartment wall...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see Spidey clinging to the wall -- he looks surprised that you've
entered the apartment place.  You wonder to yourself what's his 
connection to Peter Parker...  Spider-Man wears a strange looking 
costume with a large spider in the center.  He has some web-shooters
on his wrist.  He doesn't look too happy that you're here -- Spidey  
seems like he's about to spring at you!

mobs.LongDesc: A comic book collector is here looking for more books to add to his collection.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's just an ordinary comic book collector.  Like any comic book collector
he wanders around the convention, looking to find a dealer who's interested
in trading his worthless comics for some high-grade Silver-Age treasures.

mobs.LongDesc: A comic dealer is trying hard to sell his entire comic collection.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's unemployed and in desperate need for money.  It's a shame that he's
selling all those cool comic books that he had accumulated in the past.
The dealer is holding a strange key...it seems to be glowing...  The
dealer seems to be holding the key firmly as though it was something
precious.

mobs.LongDesc: Jarvis, the Avenger's loyal butler, is here pruning some shrubbery.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's a tall, slender fellow wearing a black and white uniform.  He speaks
with a British accent and has been serving the Avengers for the last
thirty years.  Good o' Jarvis is the most trustworthy servant that money
can buy...

mobs.LongDesc: The Incredible Hulk is ready to destroy everything in sight.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's 7 feet tall and weighs over half a ton.  The savage green goliath
towers over you.  You begin to shiver...his monstrous size is unimaginable.
The Hulk growls at you because he trusts no one.  Don't you think it's
time to leave?

mobs.LongDesc: A vicious junk-yard dog is ready to rip you to pieces!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc: This dog is no Fido...  He's rabid and ready to take you down.

mobs.LongDesc: A security guard is here looking for any signs of trouble.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's a typical high-paid guard.  He stands 6'4" and can kick you butt
anytime--any day.

mobs.LongDesc: The Thing cries out,"It's Clobbering Time!!!"
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see an ugly looking orange creature...  His skin is made of solid
rock.  The creature is about 6'4" and he's MASSIVE.  He looks at you
with distaste...it looks like you're in trouble, kiddo.

mobs.LongDesc: The Human Torch is here laughing at Ben Grimm's jokes.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's the teenage sensation...the dream date for all young girls--he's 
the dashing Johnny Storm but you can call him the Human Torch.  You
don't want to get too close to him--you might get burned...

mobs.LongDesc: Mr. Fantastic is wondering how Dr. Doom will try to take over the world.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Reed Richards is the leader of the Fantastic Four.  He's valuable not
for his pathetic fighting abilities but rather his superior intelligence.
Mr. Fantastic is a cheap imitation of the Plastic Man however he has
his unique qualities...

mobs.LongDesc: The Invisible Woman is wondering if anyone would ever notice her presence.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She's invisible...  The Invisible Woman is also known as Susan Storm       
Richards.  She's a very attractive young woman--it's a shame she likes
old guys like Reed Richards.

mobs.LongDesc: The Invincible Iron Man is trying to keep the Avengers in order.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The man behind the armor is Tony Stark, multi-millionaire and entrepreneur.
 He also leads the Avengers when Captain America is absent.  Iron Man
is a capable leader and also an intelligent strategist.

mobs.LongDesc: A BIG, TALL guy is standing here watching where he's stepping...must be Giant-Man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's can adjust his growth to be much taller than a 4 story building.  Hank
Pym also know as Giant-Man has developed a formula which could alter
the size of any living matter.  He became Giant-Man to use his new found
formula for combat the forces of evil.

mobs.LongDesc: There's a annoying bug here flying everywhere in the room...must be that Wasp.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Wasp is so small, she could sneak into any room without anyone knowing.
She's so tiny but don't be fooled by her size--the Wasp can sting...

mobs.LongDesc: The Avenger's archer, Hawkeye, is here waiting to be leader someday *sigh*
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hawkeye is the most accurate archer of all time.  He can shoot an arrow
that'll reach its target every time.  Hawkeye is also a skilled fighter.

mobs.LongDesc: The super-android name Vision is here to assist the leader.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Vision is one of the most powerful Avengers.  He can easily change
the molecular matter of his body.  He can pass through walls like a
ghost...

mobs.LongDesc: The Scarlet Witch is trying hard to learn some new spells.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She's considered the Sorceress Supreme in the Marvel Universe.  Though
she once served the mutant menace named Magneto...Scarlet Witch has
been reformed.  She uses her black magics to conquer all her foes...

mobs.LongDesc: Quicksilver is wondering if he can beat the Flash in a race.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Quicksilver is probably the fastest man in the Marvel Universe.  He's
amazingly quick and agile for a mutant.  Quicksilver is the brother of
Scarlet Witch.  Together they join the Avengers to combat the forces
of evil.

mobs.LongDesc: Hercules is here flexing his oversize muscles...showoff...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The son of Zeus is always ready for combat.  His size and strenght are
unmatched (with the exception of Thor, Hulk, Thing...err forget that line).
Hercules is the strongman of the Avengers.

mobs.LongDesc: A knight in dark armor is here polishing his ethereal sword.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Black Knight is the greatest swordsman that ever lived.  When he 
wields his magical blade there is none who can match him in the arts
of sword fighting.  The Black Knight is one of the oldest and the 
most celebrated Avenger.

mobs.LongDesc: The High Evolutionary wants to create the most perfect living creature.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a man covered in armor from all places.  He wears an iron mask
to conceal his identity.  His uniform makes him more godly so that his
"creation" would look up to him for guidance.  The High Evolutionary
is considered by many to be a GOD...he can destroy you with ease.

mobs.LongDesc: King Conan is here praying to his God -- Crom.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's as savage as the legends claim him to be.  Conan is a big fellow --
his muscles are bulging out from his fur cloak.  No matter what age
Conan may be, he's still the toughest Cimmerian there will ever be.

mobs.LongDesc: Red Sonja the Lady Warrior is looking for a punk to kill.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Red Sonja is a very attractive woman...  Her hair is the deepest red.  She's
one of the greatest warriors of her time.  Red Sonja is determined to 
find the men who did her wrong.

mobs.LongDesc: Firelord is soaring through space looking for some action.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Firelord is a cosmic being of enormous power.  He's capable of destroying
a galaxy with just a small fraction of his awesome power cosmic.  He
once served the World-Devourer, Galactus.  Firelord looks as though his
is on fire.  He wields a staff which he channels and directs his cosmic
powers.

mobs.LongDesc: Nova is searching for a planet for her hungry master...Galactus!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nova is the currently the herald of the World-Devourer, Galactus.  She
is constantly in search of a planet for her master's unsatiable 
appetite.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in a long cloak is riding through space...looks like the Warlock...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Warlock is one of the most powerful beings in space.  He is the keeper
of the six infinity gems.  Warlock travels with his companions through
his cosmic journey to understand the universe.

mobs.LongDesc: Drax is riding the spaceways with his pal, Warlock.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Drax is not a guy you'd like to mess with.  He's probably the strongest
guy in the universe...his strenght can match that of the Hulk's.  The 
only weakness to Drax is that he has a mind of a 7 year old...

mobs.LongDesc: Moondragon is traveling with Warlock to protect the universe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Moondragon is a priestess from another world, far from our own.  She's
gifted in many areas such as the art of fighting.  She also has 
mental abilities (telekinetic) that are so powerful that even she
could not control them.  Moondragon is an attractive woman even though
she's bald *gasp*.

mobs.LongDesc: Watch Out!  A comet is headed this way!  wait a sec...it's only Quasar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Quasar is an earthling who was given the cosmic bands to defend the
universe from evil space invaders.  Quasar has the powers to convert
light into solid objects.  His powers make him one of Marvel's most
powerful super-heroes.

mobs.LongDesc: A Skrull soldier is looking forward to killing some stinkin' humans.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Boy, those damn Skrulls are sure butt-ugly!  Their green skins and
large pointy ears are just repulsive.  However, they think the same
way about humans.  This Skrull soldier wants to ravage the earth
using their new space portal.  Is there anyone who can save us
from these monsters?

mobs.LongDesc: Thanos is devising a new plan to conquer the universe!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Thanos is known and feared throughout the universe.  His name scares 
even the most powerful, celestrial beings.  Thanos is always planning
how he can acquire more and more power.  He plans to rule the universe
one day, under HIS iron fist!

mobs.LongDesc: A punk is here trying to sell some dope.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's a stinkin' punk alright.  This drugpusher has been selling drugs
since he was a teen.  He'll kill you for money because he's an addict
himself.  This low-life has ruin the lives of many...don't you think
it's time to pay this sucka back?

mobs.LongDesc: A drug addict is here shooting needles and sniffing coke.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's a total loser.  This man turn to drugs to escape the problems of
the world and in his life.  You wonder to yourself if this slime
deserves your pity...

mobs.LongDesc: Thunderstrike is here searching for adventure and excitement.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Thunderstrike was an ordinary human being who was transformed into a
god.  He became the second Thor but had to later relinquish that title.
Thunderstrike is a big blonde fellow, he looks and sometimes act like
the real Thor.  He even wields a hammer that looks like the real deal.

mobs.LongDesc: Loki is plotting to take over Asgard with his evil allies.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Asgardian God is always determined to take over this kingdom.  He
is determined to humble the noble Thor as well as his own father,
the mighty Odin.  Loki is the master schemer, however, he doesn't
have much success when Thor's there to stop him.

mobs.LongDesc: The Tiger Shark is ready to tear your apart...come a little closer...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Tiger Shark is a vicious killer.  He's in a quest to dominate the
7 seas and to seek revenge upon the Sub-mariner for defeating him in
every battle.  Tiger Shark is a dangerous predator and he's no one
you should fool around with...

mobs.LongDesc: Attuma, the self-proclaimed Master of the 7 Seas, is looking for Namor.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Attuma is truly a magnificent being.  He fighting skills underwater can
match that of the Sub-Mariner himself.  Attuma has rarely lost a battle.
Though he has lost to Namor the Sub-Mariner in countless confrontations--
Attuma has defeated every other challengers who seek to take his throne.

mobs.LongDesc: Captain America is trying to rid the world of crime and wrong-doers.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Captain America, the patriotic super-hero, is always dedicated to stop
the Red Skull and all other super-baddies from harming innocent lives.
He is trusted by the President himself.  Cap is the most noble and
honest super-hero today.  Captain America wears a uniform made from
the US and a shield made of pure adamantium.

mobs.LongDesc: Mephisto, the Lord of the Underworld, welcomes you to HELL!!!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mephisto is the master of the realm known as Hell.  He is truly evil
incarnate.  Mephisto has taken the souls of many innocent people.  He'd
even tried taking one from a super-being.  Mephisto is a powerful
being who's well respected by the celestrial powers.  His "magicks" 
make him the most deadliest adversary.

mobs.LongDesc: The Ghost Rider wants to wrap his chains around Mephisto's neck.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Ghost Rider is truly a Spirit of Vengeance.  He seeks to stop 
murdering super-villains as well as evil demons from harming the
innocent.  Ghost Rider is a supernatural being himself.  His hellfire
can surely burn through even the toughest stone walls!

mobs.LongDesc: Mary Jane is here doing the dishes and waiting for her hubby to come home.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She's a glamourous model and soap star.  That Peter Parker is sure lucky
to have a wife like her.  Mary Jane has nice, long red hair that matches
her luscious lips...you can imagine the rest ;)

mobs.LongDesc: An old lady is going out to buy some grocery for her nephew.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She's just a feeble, old lady.  A kind, gentle person...  There's no  
need to hurt such a friendly person.

mobs.LongDesc: Prince Namor, the king of Atlantis, is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Sub-Mariner is not a person anyone would want to mess with.  He has
the strenght of the Hulk and a very powerful army behind him.  Namor
is the king of all atlantis and an enemy of all humans.  He had tried
on several occasions to invade the continents and was stopped by the
Fantastic Four.

mobs.LongDesc: Deadpool, the deadly assassin, is here waiting for a job.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Deadpool is one of the most high-paid assassin in the world.  He is a
mutant with the power to heal himself quickly.  He even can regenerate
an arm if it was severed during an "accident."  Deadpool is quick and
agile.  He's also an expert in using all sorts of weapons.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in a red mask and costume is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Matt Murdock is the Daredevil, the Man without Fear!  Daredevil's 
power is his superhuman senses.  Blind for life because of an accident,
Murdock was exposed to a mutagen which gave him his power to "see"
things with his sonar-like senses.  Daredevil wields a billy-club 
which he uses often in battle with super-villains.

mobs.LongDesc: A pshychotic-looking woman with two long katanas is looking at you *gulp*
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Typhoid Mary is not your ordinary assassin-for-hire.  She's on of
Kingpin's top hitman...err...hitwoman.  Mary wields two sharp kitana--
she is a master of ninjitsu and has kicked Daredevil's butt several
times.

mobs.LongDesc: Bullseye the lethal assassin is here waiting for someone to piss him off.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bullseye is a master of martial arts -- no matter what style.  He has
fought many opponents and rarely does he ever loses.  Bullseye is the
most accurate sharpshooter and he never misses his target.  His
employer is Wilson Fisk aka the Kingpin...and Mr. Fisk pays him a lot!

mobs.LongDesc: A man in a purple mask and an Armani suit is quietly reading a newspaper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Rose is not a person any man should mess with.  Though he has
plotted against his father, the Kingpin, in the past the Rose has
always admire his father's ruthless tactics.

mobs.LongDesc: Wilson Fisk the Kingpin of Crime is staring down at you!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He is the mastermind behind the takeover of Apocalypse City.  The 
Kingpin is well-known throughout the world as a kind and loving person.
It's a shame that most people don't know Fisk like you do.  He's a
drug dealer, a murderer, and everything else that's associate with
the criminal underworld.  Wilson Fisk is not exactly a man with you
wrestle with.  Though he weighs more than 300 pounds -- Fisk is a
master of judo plus many other arts of fighting!

mobs.LongDesc: Thor, the God of Thunder, is singing love songs to the fair maiden, Sif.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Thor is one of the most noble gods in Asgard.  He is the son of the 
All-Father Odin and is the next in line for the throne providing that
Odin the immortal may die in a mishap someday.  Thor wields his
mighty hammer which is made from the mystical and indestructible
uru metal.

mobs.LongDesc: The Lady Sif is here listening to Thor's wonderful songs...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Asgardian Goddess is well-known in the Norse folklore.  She was
the first love of Thor, the God of Thunder.  Sif is a master swords-man
and she will fight for Asgard and to protect her beloved.

mobs.LongDesc: Odin, the Ruler of Asgard, is sitting on his mighty throne.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Odin is the All-Father of Asgard.  He is the most powerful Asgardian in
the kingdom.  Odin is a noble man even though he had made many bad
judgements in the past.  Odin has a long white beard and a suit made
of pure mystical steel.

mobs.LongDesc: Electro wants to give you a warm handshake -- come over here...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Electro can generater unlimited amount of electricity from his body.  His
electric shock can burn you into ashes.

mobs.LongDesc: Carnage is here on a murdering spree!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Carnage is the "offspring" of Venom.  His costume is made of the same
alien substance as that of Venom's.  Carnage is much more ruthless and
dangerous than any deranged criminal.

mobs.LongDesc: Kang, the master of time, is planning to take over the world.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Kang is a criminal of the future, the past, and the present.  He is a
dangerous man to deal with.  He can use actually use "time" as an
ultimate weapon against his enemies.

mobs.LongDesc: A bird of prey named the Vulture is here looking for Spider-Man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Vulture has been a nemesis of Spider-Man for quite sometime.  His
power of flight and manueverability in the air makes him a deadly
foe.

mobs.LongDesc: A robot guard of Dr. Doom is protecting his master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He looks exactly like Dr. Doom himself but he's only a robot...right?
These robots are designed to attack anyone to tries to harm Doom.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in an iron mask is looking at you and laughing out loud!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dr. Doom is one of the earth's most "brightest" criminal masterminds.
He is a master of science as well as the mystic arts.  Doom is the
most elusive super-villain because of his superior intelligence and 
wit.

mobs.LongDesc: The real Dr. Doom is preparing for a battle with YOU!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is the ORIGINAL Dr. Doom not that robot fake you've just fought.
Dr. Doom laughs at you...  He doesn't think you have what it takes
to stop him from taking over the world.  Doom wears an iron mask as
well as an armor all over his body.  He has gauntlets which could
send out a powerful burst of energy to his victim.

mobs.LongDesc: Doctor Octopus walks across the room using his adamantium tentacles.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
You see a man with four long steel tentacles.  These tentacles are 
connected to his body.  Doctor Octupus uses these tentacles as a 
means of controlling his criminal empire.  His tentacles are made
of pure adamantium, the same substance used for Captain America's shield
and Wolverine's skeleton!

mobs.LongDesc: A green, scaly creature is ready to rip your head off -- he's the Abomination.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Abomination was exposed to gamma radiation similar to the Hulk...
however his dosage was even greater.  That accident turned him into
a maniac with the strenght that even the Hulk can't match.  The
Abomination is a green, scaly type creature -- he looks like a Merman.

mobs.LongDesc: A waitress with tight jeans is here to serve your needs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
She's cute alright.  She wears some pretty tight jeans...maybe you
should ask her for her number.

mobs.LongDesc: The White Queen is here drinking her usual -- a Bloody Mary.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Emma Frost aka the White Queen is a mutant of great power.  Her power
of telekinetic is impossible to match.  The White Queen wears a
kinky leather outfit and a long white cape.

mobs.LongDesc: Omega Red is trying to think of a way to kill Wolverine.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Omega Red is the eternal enemy of Wolverine.  He wears a red and white
armor with a large tentacle connected to each of his hands.

mobs.LongDesc: The Sandman is here looking for a fight -- whatcha lookin' at, punk?
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Sandman has the power to change his body completely into sand.  He
can make a large mallet out of his hand as a weapon...  The Sandman
can turn his body into solid rock which makes him almost invincible.

mobs.LongDesc: The deadly Venom is here trying to find a way to kill Spider-Man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Venom is a ruthless killer.  He especially want to see Spider-Man dead.
After countless defeats under the Web-Slinger, Venom has sworn to 
find a way to kill Spider-Man.  Venom is wearing a black pajama with
a large symbol of a spider in the middle.  The suit is actually a
living alien --the host is the man in this costume, Eddie Brock.

mobs.LongDesc: The war-machine known as the Deathlok is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's half man and half machine.  Deathlok is a one-man-army and he's
ready to kick some punk's ass.  Deathlok wields a powerful phaser gun.

mobs.LongDesc: A skinny sailor is running from the Skipper.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Gilligan is a little guy--shy and honest.  He's wearing a red shirt and
some sailor's pants.  Gilligan is always getting in trouble and making
the Skipper mad.

mobs.LongDesc: The Skipper is chasing Gilligan all around the island.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Skipper is always picking on poor Gilligan.  He's a pretty big guy.
He wears a large blue shirt and a captain's hat.

mobs.LongDesc: A man in a long cloak is floating in mid-air!
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dr. Strange is the greatest and the most powerful magic-user on Earth.
No one can best him in the mystic arts.  Stephen Strange was trained 
by the Ancient One himself.  Strange is wearing a long cloak and he
wears a bright gold band around his finger.  He's also holding a 
"strange" key.

mobs.LongDesc: An alien with a head of flame is staring at you -- with interest.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Dormammu is the deadliest rival of Dr. Strange.  He had tried to murder
Strange many times in the past.  He's locked up in this dimension with
no where else to go.

mobs.LongDesc: Baron Mordo wants to get his REVENGE on Doctor Strange.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He used to be the only desciple of the Ancient One himself until Stephen
Strange became a student.  Baron Mordo was never as good as Strange
in the mystic arts.  Mordo vowed that he would be the one and only
Supreme Sorcerer of earth after he kill off Strange.

mobs.LongDesc: A beautiful woman is held captive by that fiend Dormammu -- it's Clea.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Clea is the beloved of Doctor Strange.  She was also a student of the
evil Dormammu.  Her birth place is the same as that of Dormammu -- they
belong to another dimension.

mobs.LongDesc: Kraven the Hunter is setting up a trap for Spider-Man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's believed to be the greatest hunter in the world.  Kraven is an
expert of many different forms of martial arts.  He has the speed of
a cheetah and the strenght of an elephant.

mobs.LongDesc: Nick Fury, the leader of S.H.I.E.L.D., is here smoking a cigar.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nick Fury is the head of the organization called S.H.I.E.L.D.  He has
lead his men into war with criminal organizations such as A.I.M. and
Hydra.  Fury is one of the most powerful men in the states -- his
control over the agents of Shield makes him as powerful as the
president himself!

mobs.LongDesc: A Shield agent is getting ready to kick some criminal butt.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's just a regular agent of Shield.  This agent is very well-trained.
He wears the standard Shield uniform and carries a few high-tech weapons.

mobs.LongDesc: "Dum Dum" Dugan is looking for Nick Fury.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Timothy "Dum Dum" Dugan is the right-hand man of Nick Fury.  He has
been in many battles with Fury and was awarded as Nick's most
trusted officer and friend.

mobs.LongDesc: The Super Patriot is here to challenge Captain America.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Johnny Walker aka the Super Patriot is a vigilante but unlike Captain
America he likes to "teach" these criminals a lesson.  He is much 
like the Punisher -- a man who would go to extremes to punish the
criminal underworld.

mobs.LongDesc: The brave Heimdall is here to guard the entrance to Asgard.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Heimdall is a large man -- about 6'11" and he doesn't look too friendly.
He's an expert swordman as well as one of Odin's most trusted soldiers.
He was given the position of guarding the entrance to Asgard by Odin
himself.  He's willing to give up his life than to let a trespasser pass
by him without authorization.

mobs.LongDesc: Fandral the Unbeatable is guarding the royal family of Asgard.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Fandral is probably the best swordsman in the Warriors' Three.  He
has beaten countless foes within minutes and sometimes even seconds!

mobs.LongDesc: A dashing, handsome warrior named Hogun is here to serve his majesty.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He bold and daring...Hogun is a man of many talents.  He is an expert
swordsman and one of Odin's most trusted warriors.  Hogun has fought
alongside with the Warriors' Three for many long years.

mobs.LongDesc: An overweight warrior named Volstagg is here to protect Odin.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Volstagg is one of the members of the Warriors' Three.  His size is
awesome -- Volstagg weighs more than a thousand pounds yet he has
the agility and speed of a "normal" man.

mobs.LongDesc: The all-mighty Galactus is standing here...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Galactus is considered by many to be a God because of his awesome powers.
He can absorb the energies of a planet and use these energies to feed 
his unsatiable hunger.  Galactus uses his superior intelligence and 
technology to reach his goal.  There is no one who can match the unlimited
power that he possesses.  Galactus has the "power cosmic" -- the power
of the life-force of all living things.  Galactus used this power cosmic
to create heralds such as the Silver Surfer, Firelord, Terrax, Nova, and
the Destroyer.

mobs.LongDesc: Silver Surfer is here to protect his former master.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Silver Surfer was the first herald of the mighty Galactus.  No other
herald was more powerful than the Surfer.  Silver Surfer can absorb
cosmic powers easily because his silvery skin acts as a "solar cell."
He holds a surfboard which he can control with his mind.  The board
is totally indestructable and not even the brutish strength of the
Hulk can break it.

mobs.LongDesc: The deadly Hobgoblin is here, counting his loot.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Hobgoblin is one of Spider-Man's most deadliest foes.  He's also one of
the most highly paid assassin around.  The Hobgoblin has no conscience
when killing anyone.  He's a psychotic murderer with no remorse.  Spider-
Man has never been able to capture this ellusive criminal.  The Hobgoblin
has been known to work for the Rose and the Kingpin.

mobs.LongDesc: A man with a large skull on his chest is loading his .38 caliber pistol.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Punisher is THE vigilante of all vigilantes.  Frank Castle (the Punisher)
has vowed to destroy all criminal empires of the world.  He gives no
mercy to drug pushers, pimp, murderers, and all other sinners.  The
Punisher is a one-man-army who's ready to clean house -- preferably
the house of the Kingpin!

mobs.LongDesc: Microchip, the Punisher's sidekick, is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Microchip is the loyal sidekick of the Punisher.  They both share the 
same dream -- to put an end to all crime.  Microchip's history is much
like the Punisher.  His family was murdered and he seeks revenge on
all criminals by assisting the Punisher.

mobs.LongDesc: A Morlock is here, looking for some food.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A typical Morlock...  He's filthy and hungry for food.  The Morlocks are
mutant outcasts of society.  Because of their hideous appearance, they
fear they may be lynch by the "normal" people.

mobs.LongDesc: Leech is trying to contact the X-Men.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Leech is one of the youngest Morlocks in the clan.  He has the power
to absorb powers of other mutants.  Leech was once a member of the
first X-Factor team.

mobs.LongDesc: The Mole Man is planning to invade the surface world.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
The Mole Man is the first super-villain who fought the Fantastic Four.
He commands his people to attack the surface world countless times.
The Mole Man is the king of his underground empire.  His men are 
loyal to his commands and right now, the Mole Man is planning another
strike on the surface grounds.

mobs.LongDesc: The ubiquitous Watcher is here, watching your every movement...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Not much is known about the all-powerful Watcher.  His race is as old
as the universe itself.  All of the Watchers possesses incredible  
power.  Not many can withstand their power.  The Watchers are a 
peaceful race.  Their purpose is to observe and record all major
events happening in the universe.

mobs.LongDesc: The bastard Nazi named Red Skull is here, making a long speech.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Red Skull is the oldest and the most deadliest foe of Captain America.
During World War II, Red Skull assisted Hitler in a massacre of innocent
people in Poland.  He teaches his lackeys the ways of the Nazi and
tries hard at recruiting men into his clan.  Red Skull wears a bloody
red mask which makes all his men fear him and thus they would be loyal
to him as well.

mobs.LongDesc: A Nazi soldier is following carefully the words of the Red Skull.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's in his mid-teens, unemployed, a former convict, and a drug user --
the signs of a total loser.  Kill him, please.

mobs.LongDesc: Morbius, the living vampire, wants your thick, warm blood.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Morbius was once a prominent doctor.  He was exposed to a virus which
gave him a "disease."  Doctor Morbius was transformed into a living
vampire and requires blood as his nourishment.

mobs.LongDesc: A six-armed sorceress named Spiral is here, looking for Longshot.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Spiral is a sorceress from another dimension.  Her "magicks" are 
almost as powerful as that of Doctor Strange's.  Spiral has six arms
four which are mechanical.  She uses her many arms to wave gestures
for a spell.  Spiral is a master at teleporting through different
dimensions.  She often travels to earth to make trouble for
Longshot and the X-Men.

mobs.LongDesc: Mystique is here, planning to destroy the X-Men.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Mystique is a master of disguise.  She can change her face and clothes
in a matter of seconds.  Mystique is a very powerful mutant and also an
intelligent leader.  The government recruited her to become the leader
of the Freedom Force -- a band of mutants who serve the government.

mobs.LongDesc: Longshot is on a mission to find his former love, Dazzler.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Longshot is from a dimension unlike our own.  He comes from a dimension
where television programs control the minds of the people.  Longshot
wants to change all that and thus he became a rebel and a wanted 
criminal on his home planet.

mobs.LongDesc: Balder the Brave is preparing to battle the Ragnorak.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Balder is believed to be the bravest man in Asgard.  Because of his     
past deeds, he was granted the title "the Brave" by the mighty
Odin himself.

mobs.LongDesc: Green Goblin is soaring through the sky, looking for Spider-Man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Harry Osborne aka the Green Goblin, is a man gone mad.  Harry was once
the best friend of Spider-Man's alter-ego, Peter Parker.  The Green
Goblin is one of the few people who knows the true identity of
Spider-Man.  The Goblin wears a green mask and rides on anti-gravity
glider.

mobs.LongDesc: Havok is here, causing havoc for criminals everywhere.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Havok was once the leader of the group, X-Factor.  He is the younger
brother of the X-Man named Cyclops.  Havok has powers that are almost
uncontrollable.  Like Cyclops, Havok was born with this strange mutant
power.  He was once an X-Man himself -- for a brief period of time.

mobs.LongDesc: Polaris, the mistress of magnetism, is here looking for Havok.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Polaris has the power to control anything which is made of metal.  Her
powers are quite similar to that of Magneto's but not as powerful.
However, she has not maximize the potential of her powers.

mobs.LongDesc: A ninja assassin named Elektra has Daredevil on her hitlist.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Elektra was once the world's greatest assassin.  She became involved 
with Daredevil and that relationship changed her life.  Elektra was
thought to be dead many years ago until the management at Marvel 
Comics revived her.

mobs.LongDesc: Beta Ray Bill is having a drink with his friend, Thunderstrike.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Beta Ray Bill is an alien from a planet, hundreds of light-years away.
He was granted the power of Thor by Odin himself.  Bill was also 
given a hammer which almost rivals that of Thor's enchanted Mjornir.
Beta Ray Bill used his new powers to serve justice on his home
planet.  He makes frequent visits to Asgard and Earth.

mobs.LongDesc: The Banshee is here, scaring the punks off the streets.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
A former X-Man, the Banshee's weapon is his "wail" which can tear 
open walls or steel safes.  The Banshee is an Irish man, about 40
something.

mobs.LongDesc: Vengeance is looking for some action on the streets.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Vengeance is the Ghost Rider wannabe.  His powers are similar to those 
of the Ghost Rider but their attitudes are quite different.  Vengeance
believes in extreme violence towards criminals and he has been known
to kill them during confrontations.

mobs.LongDesc: Annihilus is here, to take over the universe.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Annihilus is the master of the Negative Zone -- a dimension that is
not known by many.  He vowed to invade the universe someday in an 
attempt to destroy Earth.  Annihilus possesses unimaginable powers 
that even the Fantastic Four cannot handle.

mobs.LongDesc: Iron Fist is looking for his good pal, Luke Cage the Power Man.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Iron Fist is a master of martial arts.  He was trained in Tibet and  
became a master.  Iron Fist's power is his Chi -- the internal power
that all men possesses.  He harness this Chi into his fist.  Iron  
Fist can deliver a blow to any man and they would die instantly.

mobs.LongDesc: An adamantium android named Ultron is on a murdering rampage.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Ultron is an android made of pure adamantium and thus he is 
indestructable.  He also has a plasma burst which could kill even
the mightiest heroes.  Ultron is a highly intelligent life-form.
He's capable of rational decisions even though he's a killing machine.

mobs.LongDesc: Luke Cage is here, beating on a gang of punks.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Luke Cage is the Power Man.  He dedicated his life to stopping crime
by any means necessary.  Cage is a big guy with bulletproof skin.  He
made a big name for himself by kicking criminal butts.  All the punks
on the street fear him...

mobs.LongDesc: The Ancient One is here to serve your needs.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
He's the most powerful sorcerer on this planet.  Even though he looks
small and weak, the Ancient One can send you to OBLIVION with one of
his deadly fireballs!

mobs.LongDesc: Sabretooth is here, stalking his prey...
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Sabretooth is the deadliest foe of the X-Man known as Wolverine.  He's a
big fellow, about 6'6", and has the agility of an olympic athlete.
Sabretooth has a healing factor just like Wolverine as well as heightened
senses.  Sabretooth has claws that are sharp as razor... don't get too
close, kid, or you'll get cut!

mobs.LongDesc: A mysterious stranger named Nomad is here.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Nomad is the former partner of the patriotic super-hero, Captain America.
He was formerly known as Bucky, an old side-kick of Cap's.  Nomad is
a skilled fighter and an expert target shooter.

mobs.LongDesc: The ghost of Bucky Barnes is here to protect his partner, Captain America.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Bucky Barnes use to be the partner of the star-spangled crime fighter,
Captain America.  Bucky was killed during one of Cap's many missions
during World War II.  Bucky Barnes was given the medal of honor by
the President himself.  It seems, however, that Bucky is still alive...
His ghost is here to protect his noble partner from any kind of danger!

mobs.LongDesc: Iceman is here, looking for Professor Xavier.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
Iceman was one of the original X-Men.  Recently he has regrouped with his
old team-mates to form a new group called X-Factor.  Iceman has the mutant
power to turn anything into ice.  He helped the X-Men in countless battles
against super-powered criminals.

mobs.LongDesc: A super hero is flying here, on patrol.
mobs.DetailedDesc:
This is one of the city's many super heroes, helping out innocent citizens
wherever they need help.

mobs.LongDesc: A Test Dummy is standing here.
mobs.DetailedDesc: nothing.
